short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will extract product main information from Amazon product page and convert it to JSON format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add a context menu item to the browser. When you right-click on an Amazon product page, you will see the "Copy Product JSON" option.
Just click on it and the product information will be copied to your clipboard in JSON format.
This extension can really help you to extract product information from Amazon product pages and save time and effort for instance if you are a seller, an affiliate or a developer who needs to extract product information from Amazon product pages.
